line_1: Her mamma was confus'd — with a little chagrin,
line_2: You'll know better in time, Miss: — She was but fifteen:

line_1: Hear me, and touch Belinda with Chagrin;
line_2: That single Act gives half the World the Spleen.

line_1: Or swol'n with pride, or wasted with chagrin,
line_2: Envying the great, and scoffing at the mean,
